name: Commercial Vehicle Group, Inc.
description: Commercial Vehicle Group, Inc. (CVGI) is a leading global supplier of custom designed and engineered products for the commercial vehicle market. Established in 2000 and headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, the company specializes in the design and manufacture of a wide range of components and systems used in heavy and medium-duty trucks, buses, and specialty vehicles. CVGI operates through multiple segments, including the Vehicle Control Systems segment, which offers various products such as cab structures, mirrors, and seating; and the Aftermarket segment, focusing on replacement parts and accessories. The company is committed to innovation and quality, continuously investing in research and development to enhance its product offerings and meet evolving customer needs. With a strong footprint in North America and expanding international presence, CVGI serves a diverse customer base, including OEMs and aftermarket distributors. The company is dedicated to sustainability, striving to implement environmentally friendly practices throughout its manufacturing processes. By leveraging advanced technologies and fostering strategic partnerships, CVGI aims to be a preferred supplier in the commercial vehicle industry, contributing to the efficiency and safety of commercial transportation.
